segments.text: I see a woman standing by the sink, completely focused on drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's surprising how she doesn't notice the water overflowing and creating a puddle around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress and apron look neat, but her foot is already in the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why she hasn't turned off the faucet yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stack of dishes beside her seems endless, but the water issue is more pressing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sad seeing her so absorbed in her task that she misses the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to the mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she realizes what's happening before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children behind her are up to something, but she seems oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how calm she remains amidst all this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dish towel she's using looks well-worn and familiar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she's ever going to turn around and see the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR
